sub_topic: Probability of a certain medical condition occurring
message_1: What is the probability that a randomly selected person from a population of 10,000 will have a certain medical condition, given that the prevalence of this condition in this population is 2.5%?
message_2: The probability that a randomly selected person from a population of 10,000 will have a certain medical condition, given that the prevalence of this condition in this population is 2.5%, is simply the prevalence itself. So the probability is 2.5% or 0.025 as a decimal.
